member.summary: Classe di risorse fortemente tipizzata per la ricerca di stringhe localizzate e così via.

member.summary: Restituisce l'istanza di ResourceManager nella cache utilizzata da questa classe.

member.name: P:ZeroCleaner.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Esegue l'override della proprietà CurrentUICulture del thread corrente per tutte le ricerche di risorse eseguite utilizzando questa classe di risorse fortemente tipizzata.

member.summary: User profile application data local path.

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.InternetExplorerCookiesDomStore
member.summary: Path to IE's cookies via DOM Store

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.InternetExplorerTemps
member.summary: Path to Internet Explorer's temp files

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.InternetExplorerRecentlyTypedUrls
member.summary: Path to Internet Explorer's recently typed URLs. See remarks.
member.remarks: IE's recently typed URLs are stored in the regstry, under HKCU.

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.InternetExplorerIndexDat_1
member.summary: Path to one of Internet Explorer's index.dat files
member.remarks: File, not directory. Index.dat files are usually locked. So you'll need to unlock it before deleting.

member.summary: Path to one of Internet Explorer's index.dat files
member.remarks: File, not directory. Index.dat files are usually locked. So you'll need to unlock it before deleting.

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.GoogleChromeCookies
member.summary: Path to Google Chrome's cookies. See Remarks.
member.remarks: This is NOT a directory and is instead a file with no extension. I think it's a SQLITE database. Either way, Chrome must be closed in order to delete this file and clear the cookies.

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.GoogleChromeCookiesDBs
member.summary: Path to Google Chrome's database cookies.

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.GoogleChromeCookiesLocalStorage
member.summary: Path to Google Chrome's local storage cookies.

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.GoogleChromeInternetHistory
member.summary: Path to Google Chrome's history directory. See Remarks.
member.remarks: The history is contained in four different files that all contain the word "History" and must be deleted in order to clear all of chrome's history. They look something like "History Index 2011-00-journal", "History Index 2011-00", "History", "History-journal". It's best to loop through each file in the directory, non-recursively, and filter for "History".

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.MozillaFirefoxSessionStore
member.remarks: Path is a file, not a directory

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.MozillaFirefoxSessionStoreBackup
member.summary: Mozilla Firefox session store backup path
member.remarks: Path is a file, not a directory

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.uTorrentTempFiles
member.summary: Main uTorrent temp files. Typically "resume.dat.old" and "settings.dat.old"

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.SpybotSdIni
member.remarks: This is a file, not a directory

member.name: F:ZeroCleaner.Paths.PaintNet
member.remarks: Recurse through each folder in this directory.
